pages.title: Pestle & Mortar
pages.text: {b Pestle & Mortar} are tools used for grinding, smashing and squeezing. They require to be powered by {(mechanisms/aeolipile)rotary force}.

The common usages of pestle & mortar include powdering tea and cocoa beans, and juicing. They are also competent to automate certain Caupona recipes that involve squeezing ingredients with anvils in dolia.
